techcrunch.title: Automated Savings Startup Digit Opens Up To All
techcrunch.topComment: Except that this company is awful because it skims ALL of the profits (interest/returns on investment) from the end user. They'd be MUCH better of simply setting up a small automated transfer into an interest bearing account or a general index fund...
